wikipedia_page.main: Stanley Fink, Baron Fink  (born 15 September 1957) is a British hedge fund manager and politician, who was formerly CEO of Man Group plc. A member of the Conservative Party, he has been a life peer in the House of Lords since 2011.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: *Stanley Fink, Baron Fink - Life Peer appointed in 2011
